message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be $1200000 to us. However, recognizing its potential worth to you might be different, we propose a fair deal. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a significant advantage without compromising on the quality and benefits the product promises. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or finalizing the transaction.
